Body:
enable = bw.wire.Wire()
clear_n = bw.wire.Wire()
clock = bw.wire.Wire()
output_1 = bw.wire.Wire()
output_2 = bw.wire.Wire()
output_3 = bw.wire.Wire()
output_4 = bw.wire.Wire()
output_bus = bw.wire.Bus4(output_1, output_2, output_3, output_4)
a = bw.state.RingCounter4(enable, clear_n, clock, output_bus)
enable.value = 1
clear_n.value = 0
clear_n.value = 1
assert output_bus.wire_values == (0, 0, 0, 1)
clock.value = 0
clock.value = 1
assert output_bus.wire_values == (0, 0, 1, 0)
clock.value = 0
clock.value = 1
assert output_bus.wire_values == (0, 1, 0, 0)
clock.value = 0
clock.value = 1
assert output_bus.wire_values == (1, 0, 0, 0)
clock.value = 0
clock.value = 1
assert output_bus.wire_values == (0, 0, 0, 1)
clock.value = 0
clock.value = 1
assert output_bus.wire_values == (0, 0, 1, 0)
enable.value = 0
clock.value = 0
clock.value = 1
assert output_bus.wire_values == (0, 0, 1, 0)
enable.value = 1
clock.value = 0
clock.value = 1
assert output_bus.wire_values == (0, 1, 0, 0)
clear_n.value = 0
assert output_bus.wire_values == (0, 0, 0, 1)
print(a.__doc__)
print(a)
a(enable=1, clear_n=1, clock=0, output_bus=None)
assert output_bus.wire_values == (0, 0, 0, 1)
a(clock=1)
assert output_bus.wire_values == (0, 0, 1, 0)
